notes: Describes structural intent for Storybook, generators, and token aggregation.
Not a replacement for tokens or Storybook config; may change or be superseded.

tokens.purpose: Component-level aggregation of relevant token categories for inspection.
tokens.implementation: Tokens remain defined by abstraction (color, shape, etc.); this layer aggregates for Storybook.

html-css.purpose: Rendered DOM + styling only; base class plus data-* modifiers; no JS or accessibility logic.

tsx.purpose: Base programmatic abstraction without accessibility layer.

tsx-react-aria.purpose: Accessibility and interaction layer using React Aria on top of TSX.

web-components.purpose: Framework-agnostic implementation layer using W3C Web Components standards. Integrates with token system via CSS custom properties that penetrate Shadow DOM boundaries.

notes: Storybook should be layer-first; tokens layer may be placeholder until implemented.
Agents should read this manifest to add or adjust stories instead of inferring structure.
